title: Batman: The Animated Series

items.eventTitle: Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy & Horror Films, USA

awardsHtml:
5 wins & 19 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

Outstanding Animated Program (For Programming One Hour or Less)
Jean MacCurdy (executive producer) - Tom Ruegger (executive producer) - Alan Burnett (producer) - Eric Radomski (producer) - Bruce Timm (producer) - Randy Rogel (writer) - Dick Sebast (director) (For episode "Robin's Reckoning", part I.)

Television Programs

Young Artist Awards

Best Performance in a Voice Over in a Feature or TV - Best Young Actor

Daytime Emmy Awards

1996 Winner Daytime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Editing - Special Class
Robert Hargreaves - Matthew A. Thorne - Russell Brower - Mike Dickeson - Bob Lacivita - Tom Maydeck - Mark Keatts - John Hegedes - Patrick Rodman - Kelly Ann Foley
1996 Nominee Daytime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Mixing - Special Class
Harry Andronis (re-recording mixer) - Matthew A. Thorne (sound mixer) - Tom Maydeck (re-recording mixer)
1996 Winner Daytime Emmy
Outstanding Music Direction and Composition
Harvey Cohen (composer) - Shirley Walker (supervising composer) (For episode "A Bullet For Bullock".)
1995 Nominee Daytime Emmy
Outstanding Music Direction and Composition
Shirley Walker
1995 Nominee Daytime Emmy
Outstanding Film Sound Editing
Mark Keatts (adr editor) - Tom Maydeck (sound editor) - Russell Brower (supervising sound editor) - Robert Hargreaves (sound editor) - Matthew A. Thorne (sound effects editor) - John Hegedes (adr editor) - Daryl B. Kell (music editor) - J.J. George (music editor) - Mike Dickeson (sound effects editor)
